ghost

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Entity
      • ghost.Ghost
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ambusher, Chaser, Ignorant, Whim

    public abstract class Ghost
extends Entity
    Provides generic functionality for a ghost, which is then used to create the specific behaviour of the ghost types. Extended by Ambusher, Chaser, Ignorant and Whim.

      • getFrameFrightenedStart

        public int getFrameFrightenedStart()
        A getter for the frame on which frightened mode began. If frightened mode is not currently in progress, this value will be -1.
        Returns:
        int this.frameFrightenedStart

      • getFrameScatterStart

        public int getFrameScatterStart()

        Returns:
        int this.frameScatterStart

      • toggleScatter

        public boolean toggleScatter(App app)
        Toggles the scatter mode. If the scatter mode is being toggled on, the frame on which this happened is stored in this.frameScatterStart.
        Parameters:
        app -
        Returns:
        boolean this.scatterMode

      • calcDistance

        public double calcDistance(int x1,
                           int y1,
                           int x2,
                           int y2)
        Calculates the straight line distance between two sets of coordinates
        Parameters:
        x1 -
        y1 -
        x2 -
        y2 -
        Returns:
        double distance between (x1,y1) and (x2,y2)

      • chooseDirection

        public int chooseDirection(int targetX,
                           int targetY)
        Calculates the straight line distance between the target and each possible direction, and finds the direction with the minimum length. i.e. if UP is possible (found with the options hashmap), then the distance between the cell 1 up from the ghost and the target will be calculated.
        Parameters:
        targetX -
        targetY -
        Returns:
        int keyCode - the keycode corresponding to the direciton chosen.

      • atIntersection

        public boolean atIntersection()
        Checks if the Ghost is currently at an intersection, and stores all possible directions in a hashmap. The opposite of the current direction is always set to false to prevent the ghost from turning back on itself.
        Returns:
        boolean if the ghost is currently at an intersection

      • checkFrightenedEnd

        public void checkFrightenedEnd(App app)
        Checks if enough time has passed (set by firghtenedLength in the config file) for frightened mode to end.

      • setScatterLengths

        public void setScatterLengths(java.lang.Long[] longLengths)
        Takes in a list of times (passed from the config file), and converts it to a list of Integers, as well as calculating the total duration of these times.
        Parameters:
        longLengths - the scatter lengths as a list of Longs (this is the format they come in from Config)

      • checkScatterMode

        public void checkScatterMode(App app)
        Checks if enough time has passed for scatter mode to be toggled (based on the scatterLengths)
        Parameters:
        app - the ghost's associated app
